item.description:
I am a researcher focusing on security problems in the cyber physical space. My current research interests include Network Security, IoT Security, and Abuse Detection and Understanding. Since June 2019, I have joined Facebook as a Research Scientist, working on various security projects such as Fuzzing and Proxy Detection.

Before joining Facebook, I had a four-year HAPPY ðŸ˜Ž research experience as a Ph.D. student at Indiana University (Go, Hoosiers!), under the supervision of Professor Feng Qian and Professor XiaoFeng Wang. And even before my Ph.D. study, I joined the fathers’ association when my son was born in Feb 2015. While it makes my Ph.D. study sometimes stressful, life indeed becomes more enjoyable and meaningful.

I will join SUNY Buffalo in Spring 2021 as a tenure-track assistant professor.

I am actively looking for self-motivated PhD students, and please drop me a message if you are interested.
